EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-08-31-Boston ESB-Email from AE.EM-2017-08-31-Boston-Email from AE
EmailTemplate.subject: Sept. 21 Executive Networking Dinner at Downtown Harvard Club of Boston
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good afternoon {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
You have been cordially invited by {{lead.Territory Owner (L):default=edit me}}, your Turbonomic Account Executive, to attend the Boston Executive Networking Event: Elastic Compute at Cloud Economics hosted by Presidio.
This private event will be hosted by Ben Nye, Turbonomic CEO & Co-Managing Partner at Bain Capital Ventures. As a part of Forbes’ “Midas List” of top VC investors and a seasoned executive, Ben will be speaking to the challenges and complexities that adopting and re-defining cloud strategies can bring upon companies' IT strategies and the proven solutions that are alleviating those challenges.
When: Thursday September 21st 2017, 5:00PM Where: Downtown Harvard Club of Boston Address: 1 Federal St. Boston, Ma 02110 RSVP: turbonomic.com/learn-boston/ <[[https://turbonomic.com/learn-boston/]]>
We hope that you will be able to join us for this private affair.
-Maria Rodriguez; Turbonomic
<[[https://turbonomic.com/learn-boston/]]>
